‚≠ê Canvas_ity Star Demo

About: This demo showcases the canvas_ity library compiled to WebAssembly. Canvas_ity is a high-quality, single-header C++ library for 2D vector graphics rendering, closely modeled on the HTML5 Canvas specification.

Star Demo: This example demonstrates path building, fills, strokes, line dash patterns, line joins, line caps, linear gradients, drop shadows, and compositing operations using JavaScript calls to the WASM library.

Loading WASM module...

JavaScript Code Using WASM Library:

// This code runs in JavaScript calling the WASM canvas_ity library:

function renderStar() {
    // Initialize canvas
    canvas.init_canvas(256, 256);
    
    // Build a star path
    canvas.begin_path();
    canvas.move_to(128.0, 28.0);   canvas.line_to(157.0, 87.0);
    canvas.line_to(223.0, 97.0);  canvas.line_to(175.0, 143.0);
    canvas.line_to(186.0, 208.0); canvas.line_to(128.0, 178.0);
    canvas.line_to(69.0, 208.0);  canvas.line_to(80.0, 143.0);
    canvas.line_to(32.0, 97.0);   canvas.line_to(98.0, 87.0);
    canvas.close_path();
    
    // Set up drop shadow
    canvas.set_shadow_blur(8.0);
    canvas.set_shadow_offset(0.0, 4.0);
    canvas.set_shadow_color(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5);
    
    // Fill with yellow
    canvas.set_fill_color(1.0, 0.9, 0.2, 1.0);
    canvas.fill();
    
    // Stroke with red, rounded joins
    canvas.set_line_join(1); // rounded
    canvas.set_line_width(12.0);
    canvas.set_stroke_color(0.9, 0.0, 0.5, 1.0);
    canvas.stroke();
    
    // Add linear gradient shine effect
    canvas.set_linear_gradient_fill(64.0, 0.0, 192.0, 256.0);
    canvas.add_color_stop_fill(0.30, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
    canvas.add_color_stop_fill(0.35, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.8);
    canvas.add_color_stop_fill(0.45, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.8);
    canvas.add_color_stop_fill(0.50, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
    
    canvas.set_global_composite_operation(1); // source_atop
    canvas.fill_rect(0.0, 0.0, 256.0, 256.0);
}
